text.config.mbaconfig.title: [MineboxAddons] Config
text.config.mbaconfig.option.bakeryTimer: Shows a timer for the Bakery Shop refresh
text.config.mbaconfig.option.cheeseTimer: Shows a timer for the Cheese Shop refresh
text.config.mbaconfig.option.cocktailTim: Shows a timer for the Cocktail Shop refresh
text.config.mbaconfig.option.coffeeTimer: Shows a timer for the Coffee Shop refresh
text.config.mbaconfig.option.durabilityW: Shows a durability bar for the item in your hand
text.config.mbaconfig.option.objectiveWi: Shows the current objective in a scoreboard
text.config.mbaconfig.option.autoIslandT: Automatically teleports you to your island when you join the server
How long to wait before teleporting
Time in seconds to wait before teleporting to your island
text.config.mbaconfig.option.bankMacro.t: Quickly add the respective amount of zeros when typing 'k', 'm' or 'b'
text.config.mbaconfig.option.toastTime.t: How long the toast will show for in seconds
Show toasts notifications for shop restocks and more.
ONLY TOUCH THIS IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING
